verbose_text: In a mouse model of TIA induced by transient mechanical compression of the middle cerebral artery, Quenault et al. have shown that molecular MRI performed 24 hours after the TIA and enhanced by MPIOs-alphaP-selectin revealed the affected vascular territory that presents an overexpression and increased surface exposure of P-selectin XREF_BIBR.
evidence: MPIOs-alphaP-selectin revealed the affected vascular territory that presents an overexpression and increased surface exposure of P-selectin
